item.title: Algorithm: Array Summary Threshold
item.description: Question Given an array of integers \(A (a_i \geq 0, i \in [0, n])\) and a threshold \(T\). If \(\sum_{i = 0}^n a_i T\), find an integer \(t\), for \(a_i t (i \in [0, n]) \rArr a_i = t\). Find the largest \(t\) which makes \(\sum_{i = 0}^n a_i \leq T\).
